column1: Being honest about our motivation is crucial since, at this stage, we might discover that it is not our own Dream at all, or that our motivation is somewhat dubious : ‘ It will impress my friends’, ‘ It will be one in the eye for my parents’, ‘ It will ease my sense of guilt’, ‘ It will make me feel more secure’, ‘ It will give me power over other people’, ‘ It will make me feel special’, ‘ It's what my partner keeps suggesting I do’, ‘ It's the opposite of what my partner suggests I do.’
